title: The maid in this video who is seen mixing urine in the food is not Muslim
subtitle: The maid seen in the video mixing urine in the food of her employer is not a Muslim woman named Hasina. Her name is Asha Kaushal and she is not a Muslim
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post with a video from ‘News24’ channel is being shared on Facebook with a claim that a Muslim maid named ‘Haseena’ was caught on CCTV mixing urine in the food of her Hindu employer. Let’s try to analyze the authenticity of the claim made in the post.



Claim: A muslim maid named ‘Haseena’ was caught on CCTV mixing her urine and spit while cooking in her Hindu employer’s house. Fact: The women who is seen in the video mixing urine in the food is not a Muslim, her name is ‘Asha Kaushal’. The incident in the video was reported in Bhopal in 2011. Hence, the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When searched on Google based on the information provided in the shared video, using keywords ‘Bhopal maid urine’, an article published by ‘The Times of India’ was found in the search results. From the article, it is understood that the incident took place in Bhopal in 2011 and the maid’s name is ‘Asha Kaushal’. Mukesh Suri, her employer, has mentioned in the article that he had installed CCTV cameras in his house as some household articles were missing, however, he found out that the maid was mixing urine in the food.

Also, while speaking to ‘India Today’, Praveen Dube, a ‘News 24’ journalist has mentioned that the maid is not a Muslim. The same information about this incident can also be found in ‘Aajtak‘ and ‘Dainik Jagran‘ articles.



To sum it up, the maid who is seen in the video mixing urine in the food of her employer is not a Muslim woman named Hasina. Her name is Asha Kaushal and she is not a Muslim.
